casebody.data:
McManus, Appellee, v. Eaton Corporation, Appellant; Mayfield, Admr., Appellee.

[Cite as McManus v. Eaton Corp. (1989), 43 Ohio St. 3d 611.]

(No. 88-1206 Submitted May 9, 1989 Decided June 14, 1989.) Webster M. Lonas, Jr., for appellee McManus. Willacy & LoPresti and Aubrey B. Willacy, for appellant. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and William M. O’Neill, for appellee Mayfield.

This appeal is dismissed, sua *612sponte, as having been improvidently allowed.

Sweeney, Douglas, H. Brown and Re snick, JJ., concur. Moyer, C.J., Holmes and Wright, JJ., separately dissent. Moyer, C.J.,

dissenting. I would affirm the judgment of the court of appeals.

 Holmes, J.,

dissenting. I would reverse the judgment of the court of appeals.
